name: field
title: Field
description: Text input wrapper with label and error state

props.name: label
props.description: Input label text displayed above the input.

props.name: error
props.description: Error message - shows error state and displays message below input.

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below input (when no error).

props.name: leftIcon
props.description: Icon to display on the left side of input.

props.name: rightIcon
props.description: Icon to display on the right side of input.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: Full width input - expands to fill container.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Accessible label for screen readers when no visible label is provided.

props.name: aria-describedby
props.description: Additional element IDs that describe this input.

examples.title: With error
examples.code: <Field label="Email" type="email" error="Please enter a valid email" />

examples.title: With icons
examples.code:
import { Mail } from 'lucide-react';

<Field label="Email" type="email" leftIcon={<Mail size={18} />} />

examples.title: With helper text
examples.code: <Field label="Password" type="password" helperText="Must be at least 8 characters" />
